description: Dive into "Shimmering Shores of Sharjah" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Shimmering Shores of Sharjah

places.generalDescription: Al Mamzer Beach, located in Dubai, is a popular destination for locals and tourists alike. The beach park offers a peaceful atmosphere with stunning landscapes of blue waters and lush palm and coconut trees. Visitors can enjoy various activities such as BBQs, jet skiing, sunbathing, swimming, picnicking, and more on its 5 sandy stretches. Families often visit the beach for water sports like kayaking and jet skiing while children can partake in various water games.

sources.snippet: Al Mamzar Beach has two distinct features: a park and a Sharjah open beach, which are both located on the same property. Al Mamzar beaches are just 2 kilometers away, making this a great place to spend the day lounging on the beach or taking in the sights. The beach is popular among families for activities such as kayaking and jet skiing, and there are a variety of water games and activities for children to enjoy.
sources.shortName: 8 surprising facts you didn’t know about Sharjah beaches – UAE Travel and Expat Life!!

sources.snippet: This coastline brags for its spectacular brown exposed seaside and an incredible park. It is only two kilometer from Al Mamzar, giving an ideal destination to make your day count. Al Mamzar is famous with the residents and far household for its fabulous escapades, for instance, jet skiing (kayaking) and unlimited water deeds for your kids.
sources.siteName: Latest News Dubai | Dubai Travel | Explore Dubai
sources.shortName: 6 Finest Beaches in Sharjah

sources.snippet: Located on Al Mamzar Al Khaleej Road, this public beach spans a whopping 106 hectares. It is understandable why its so large - the beach park includes a well-kept public lawn, a public pool, and even cycle paths for bike enthusiasts. This means that there's plenty of space to enjoy warm sands as well as cool grass in the same afternoon.

Whether you want to build sandcastles, play beach games, swim in the refreshing water, or simply relax on the sandy shore, Sharjah’s beaches offer a perfect getaway for a day of fun and relaxation.

sources.snippet: Al Mamzar Beach offers a unique blend of features – a park and an open beach. Just a short distance from Al Mamzar beaches in Dubai, this spot is ideal for families. You can enjoy activities like kayaking and jet skiing, and there’s plenty of water fun for kids.

places.name: Al Mamzer Beach

reviews.text:
It's always my favourite spot to visit and stay calm for sometime

There are some restaurants and coffee shops nearby and some of them are my favourites

Parking is always available and easy to find

You can take bath and there are provisions for bathroom and change rooms nearby

For walking and cycling kind of physical activities this is best place

Kids can play and enjoy there time here

Only thing I don't like is people smoke here without any hesitation and you to be a passive smoker

Al Mamzar Beach is a wonderful place to relax and unwind! The view of the city lights at night is breathtaking. It's a great spot for barbecues, with plenty of picnic areas to enjoy with family and friends. absolutely stunning. It's a perfect place for a barbecue, with plenty of picnic spots to choose from. The beach itself is very clean, and I appreciate the presence of lifeguards constantly patrolling for safety. There's also a net for those who want to play beach volleyball, adding to the fun activities available. The toilets are well-maintained and designed to accommodate many visitors. Plus, the 5 AED entrance fee is absolutely worth it! Conveniently, there's a bus stop right at the entrance, making it easy to access. Highly recommended for a perfect day out!

We visited Al Mamzar Beach after work with colleagues, friends, and their families. We brought along our food, mats, and other essentials to enjoy a relaxing picnic by the beach. Watching the sunset together was such a highlight.. beautiful and calming. The beach was spacious, clean, and not too crowded, making it the perfect place to bond, share meals, and unwind. Highly recommended for group hangouts and peaceful beach evenings!

places.generalDescription: Al Mamzar Beach Park, located at the Dubai-Sharjah border, offers a vast expanse of landscaped greenery, four pristine beaches, and various recreational facilities such as swimming pools, children's games, and bike rentals. Visitors can enjoy paddleboarding in the calm waters while taking in scenic views of Sharjah. The park also features barbecue areas, volleyball pitches, basketball courts, and a small skate park.

sources.snippet: The public park area has four beach areas, all staffed with lifeguards. There's a picnic area, a playground for kids, and two large swimming pools. All are free and open to the public.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Dubai | PlanetWare

places.name: Al Mamzar Beach Park

reviews.text: Beautiful and clean beach with clear water and soft sand. Great for relaxing or spending time with family. Loved the facilities like BBQ spots, shaded areas, and clean restrooms. Peaceful and not too crowded - one of my favorite spots in Dubai!

We had a great time at this park. It's quite far from our home, but we decided to explore the area anyway and check in. We're constantly discovering new places around Dubai and want to know every hidden spot.

Aside from the issue with the lack of covered parking, everything else was pretty good. Lots of greenery and a nice beach. The water is clean and turquoise. There are snack kiosks, beautiful panoramic views, and beautiful Dubai skyline from a wooden observation tower.

Great vibe, especially in the evening when it's not too hot.
Highly recommend visiting. ❤️❤️❤️

The park is spacious and features several beautiful beaches. Each beach is equipped with air-conditioned changing rooms, showers, and restrooms.

There's plenty of shade available, both on the beach and throughout the park.

You'll also find a few kiosks offering drinks and snacks. The area has good winds, soft sandy beaches, and designated spots for barbecuing - perfect for a relaxing day outdoors.

places.generalDescription: Sharjah Corniche is a stunning waterfront promenade that runs along the Arabian Gulf, offering a delightful mix of natural beauty and urban charm. The best time to visit is from November to March when the weather is perfect for outdoor activities like walking, jogging, cycling, and rollerblading. You can take in scenic views of the Gulf, lush gardens, and the iconic Eye of the Emirates Ferris wheel by strolling or renting bikes.

sources.snippet: However, as compared to the private beaches, the public beaches like Al Corniche Beach, Buhaira Corniche, Sharjah Corniche are more crowded. This region has some of the best lagoons and creeks, which can be the best places for having a picnic other than the parks of course. You can enjoy various activities and water-sports at Al Khan Lagoon and Al Mamzar Lagoon, which lie between Dubai and Sharjah.
sources.shortName: Best and Popular Beaches in Sharjah

places.name: Sharjah Corniche

reviews.text:
This idyllic escape is a perfect spot to unwind and soak in natural beauty, especially as the day transitions into evening. The serene stretch of pristine ocean water glimmers under the fading sunlight, framed by a lush cluster of trees on the opposite shore Above, birds glide gracefully, while the laughter of children playing nearby adds a cheerful energy to the scene.

As dusk approaches, the sky transforms into a golden-hour spectacle-a paradise for photography enthusiasts. Whether you're capturing the vibrant hues of the sunset, enjoying a leisurely stroll by the water, or simply basking in the tranquil ambiance this place offers a slice of magic for every visitor. A must-visit for those seeking peace, beauty, and unforgettable momentse.

The Sharjah Corniche is one of the most charming and well-maintained waterfront promenades in the UAE, offering visitors a blend of natural beauty, leisure activities, and cultural experiences. Here's a detailed review:

Scenic Beauty
•	Stunning Views: Stretching along the coastline, the Corniche provides breathtaking views of the Persian Gulf. Whether it's sunrise or sunset, the horizon offers a palette of warm colors that create a serene backdrop for any outing.
•	Lush Landscaping: The area is beautifully landscaped with manicured gardens, palm trees, and walking paths that invite relaxation and leisurely strolls.

Amenities & Facilities
•	Walking and Cycling Paths: The Corniche features dedicated paths for walking, jogging, and cycling, making it a popular spot for fitness enthusiasts and families alike.
•	Seating and Picnic Areas: Numerous benches and picnic spots are available along the route, allowing visitors to sit back, enjoy the sea breeze, and take in the panoramic views.
•	Clean and Well-Maintained: The area is kept clean by the local municipality, ensuring a pleasant environment for both locals and tourists.

Family-Friendly Atmosphere
•	Play Areas for Children: Several play areas are available, making it an ideal destination for families with young children.

Sharjah Corniche is one of the most scenic and peaceful spots in the city, perfect for anyone looking to relax by the sea or take a long walk along the waterfront. The well-maintained promenade stretches along the coast, offering beautiful views of the Arabian Gulf, especially during sunset. The area is clean, safe, and family-friendly, with plenty of benches, green spaces, and spots to enjoy a quiet picnic.

There are several cafes and restaurants nearby, making it a nice place to grab a bite while enjoying the sea breeze. It's also a popular place for joggers, cyclists, and people who simply want to enjoy the open space and fresh air away from the hustle of the city.

One of the best things about Sharjah Corniche is how peaceful it feels, especially in the early morning or late evening. Whether you're a local or a tourist, it's definitely worth a visit.

places.address: Sarah Center, S101, Al Shuwaiheen - Sharjah, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Sharjah Beach is a long stretch of golden sand that overlooks the Arabian Gulf. The beach strip will include public parking spaces, as well as beach amenities such as an observation deck overlooking the gulf and a panoramic jumbo screen that broadcasts live sports events. sources.snippet: If you are wondering about the location of the most-anticipated Sharjah Beach project, you can spot the construction site just to the south of Al Fisht Beach and close to Al Muntazah Square. According to the Sharjah Urban Planning Council (SUPC), the plan includes various beach amenities that overlook Arabian Gulf as well as over a thousand public parking spaces across the entire beach strip. Set to be one of the liveliest beaches in Sharjah, this recreational spot will easily become the hottest vacation destination for tourists and locals alike.

places.name: Sharjah Beach

reviews.text:
Fabulous beach for families with plenty of car parking. Mind that parking is 10dh/hr. But you can find cheaper parking spots around the area.

Plenty of toilets and changing rooms which are very clean.

You can swim in the shallow waters here

Good & clean beach plenty of car parking. chrge is 10dh/hr. You can find cheaper parking spots around the area.
Recenty added toilets and changing rooms.

Sharjah Beach is a beautiful and peaceful destination along the coastline of the UAE. It offers a more relaxed and family-friendly alternative compared to the busier beaches of Dubai. Here's a review based on different aspects:

Scenic Beauty & Atmosphere

Sharjah Beach features a long stretch of soft golden sand and clear blue waters. Unlike commercialized beaches, it has a more natural and serene ambiance, making it perfect for relaxation. The sunsets here are stunning, providing excellent photo opportunities.

Facilities & Amenities
•	Walking & Cycling Tracks: The well-maintained tracks along the beach make it a great spot for jogging, walking, or cycling.
•	Shaded Seating Areas: There are plenty of shaded spots and benches where visitors can relax and enjoy the view.
•	Play Areas for Kids: Some sections of the beach include small play areas, making it family-friendly.
•	Clean & Well-Maintained: The authorities ensure that the beach remains clean and organized, with regular maintenance.

Activities
•	Swimming: The water is generally calm, making it a good spot for swimming. However, lifeguards may not always be present, so caution is advised.
•	Picnicking: Many visitors enjoy picnicking with family and friends. BBQs may not be allowed in some areas, so checking local rules is recommended.
•	Water Sports: While not as commercialized as Dubai's beaches, some areas may offer kayaking or jet skiing.

Accessibility & Location

Sharjah Beach is easily accessible by car and has ample parking space. It's also well-connected to other parts of the UAE, making it a convenient getaway for residents and tourists.

Final Verdict

Sharjah Beach is a great spot for families, couples, and anyone looking for a peaceful beach experience. It's not as crowded or commercialized as Dubai's beaches, making it ideal for relaxation. If you prefer a quiet, scenic spot with basic amenities, it's definitely worth visiting.

places.address: Al Muntazah St, Al Fisht - Alheera Suburb - Sharjah, United Arab Emirates

Clean Restrooms and Showers: The beach provides air-conditioned changing rooms and shower facilities, ensuring comfort for all guests.  ￼Jogging and Cycling Tracks: Dedicated paths cater to fitness enthusiasts, making it a popular spot for morning and evening exercises.Children's Play Areas: Multiple playgrounds are available, making it a family-friendly location.  ￼
￼

places.generalDescription: Shabab Al Khan Cafeteria is a delightful spot just a short stroll from Al Khan Beach, making it an ideal stop for those looking to grab a quick bite. The menu boasts an array of options including burgers, fried chicken, chili chicken, sandwiches, seafood, and fries—all at wallet-friendly prices. During my recent visit with family, we were pleasantly surprised by the bustling atmosphere and friendly staff.

sources.snippet: Shabab Al Khan is located around a 15 minute walk from Al Khan Beach and similarly to Burj Al Khan, makes a great stop for a quick meal. The menu includes meals such as burgers, fried chicken, chilli chicken, sandwiches, seafood, and fries. Much like Burj Al Khan, the food prices are reasonable with the average cost for 2 mains and 2 drinks being 50 AED.

Food is amazing.. tried a lot of items but very budget friendly place.. FF Dynamite chicken was worth the amount, chicken noodles was soo good that made us order an extra set, chicken fried rice and chicken biriyani with limited rice was an average.. lemon mint with 7up and lotus ice cream cake was amazing.. mini chicken samosas in dynamite sauce as well

places.generalDescription: La Bamba Beach Club is a hidden gem that promises an enchanting dining experience amidst swaying palm trees and the soothing sounds of ocean waves. This charming restaurant, located within the Occidental Sharjah Grand Hotel, offers a delightful menu featuring BBQ delights, fresh salads, and mouthwatering sandwiches. For those with a sweet tooth, their desserts are simply irresistible and will have you planning your next visit before you've even left!

sources.snippet: Located a 15 minute walk from Al Khan Beach, La Bamba is at the Occidental Sharjah Grand Hotel and is a great option if you are wanting to eat in and relax rather than stop for a quick meal. The menu includes traditional dishes such as cuscus, paella, grills, and steaks. Meals are more expensive here but make for a great treat out, costing on average 330 AED for appetisers, mains, drinks, and a dessert for two people.

places.name: La Bamba Restaurant

It has a beautiful setting and the place wasn't that busy when we went there for sunset dinner. The food and drink was delicious and in good portion. We enjoyed our meal and had an amazing time. Would definitely visit this place again ❤️

Very average food and service - too salty and pretty lack lustre overall. Lamb chops were ok, mixed grill very very average and all seafood (shrimps etc) was definitely frozen before cooked.

The lobster salad was downright inedible - it was sent back.

places.name: Al Khan Beach

reviews.text:
I've been a frequent visitor to Al Khan Beach since it first opened, and it has remained one of my favorite spots ever since. If you're looking for a relaxing and enjoyable day under the sun, I highly recommend giving it a try.

The beach offers a very welcoming atmosphere, perfect for families, friends, or solo visitors. It's always kept incredibly clean, which makes the experience even better. Parking is conveniently located close to the beach, so it's hassle-free, and there are cozy cafés nearby where you can enjoy your favorite drink and enjoy your time at the beach.

I can confidently say that Al Khan Beach never disappoints.

• Make it your next destination-you won't regret it

Al khan beach the perfect swimming getaway.!!
This beach has a lively vibe with plenty to do-swings by the shore, and lots of people soaking it all in. The view is beautiful, and there's always something going on. It does get pretty crowded, so it's not the quietest spot, but if you're in the mood for a fun, social beach day, it's a solid pick. Great for families or if you just want to be around some buzz.

This is one of those special places where you can truly relax, meditate, or enjoy quality time with your family. I still remember my first visit-it was during winter, and the air was cool and refreshing. The calm atmosphere left a lasting impression on me, and even now, it continues to bring me peace.

Unlike many other beaches, this spot isn't too crowded, especially on regular days. However, expect a livelier scene during holidays when families and groups gather to celebrate and have fun.

If you're looking to unwind, think, or simply enjoy the sea breeze, I highly recommend visiting. Note: There's a small entrance fee of 10 AED, but it's well worth it for the experience

places.address: 89M5+RQX, Al Khan - Sharjah, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Al Heera Beach, nestled in the tranquil suburb of Sharjah, is a hidden gem that beckons both adventure seekers and relaxation enthusiasts. Known for its strong winds, this beach is a paradise for windsurfers and kitesurfers alike. Whether you're a beginner looking to learn from skilled instructors or an experienced rider eager to tackle challenging waves, Al Heera offers the perfect conditions for water sports.

sources.snippet: Escape the crowds at this secluded beach in the Sharjah suburb of Al Heerah, a haven for windsurfers and kitesurfers thanks to strong winds that provide the perfect conditions to ride the waves. Novice windsurfers can take lessons from experienced instructors, while seasoned pros can test their skills against challenging conditions. After your adrenaline-pumping session, unwind on the golden sand and soak in the serene atmosphere.Al Heerah Suburb – Sharjah
sources.shortName: from sunbathing to watersports –

sources.snippet: Al Fisht beach is the perfect location to enjoy a picnic and walk across the sand. Due to the strong currents, it is strictly prohibited to swim in the water, however, the white sands offer more than enough entertainment. Once you have enjoyed the beach, head to the Al Fisht park, directly opposite the beach, and take a stroll around the perfectly manicured grass lawns.
sources.shortName: Best beaches in Sharjah - Laundryheap Blog

sources.snippet: Does the busy vibe of public beaches with loud groups and vrooming jet-skis bother you?. If you’re seeking pure relaxation while spending a lazy afternoon by the sea, we have found just the beach for you!. Tucked away at the edge of a peaceful residential area, this family beach in Sharjah provides an idyllic backdrop to the villas for rent in Al Fisht.

sources.shortName: Coral Beach, Khorfakkan & More -MyBayut

sources.snippet: If you are not looking for any adventure or thrill, Al Fisht Beach is one of the best beaches in Sharjah you can visit to just seek leisure. The white sands and the palm trees lined along the coast makes it ideal to ease out on a lazy day. While the sun is beaming, the sand appears glittering crystal of soft white sand creating a mirage.
sources.shortName: Top 15 Beaches In Sharjah You Must Visit In This Cultural City

sources.snippet: If you’re not searching for adventure or thrills, Al Fisht Beach is one of the greatest beaches in Sharjah to visit if you’re simply seeking to relax. It’s also one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. The white beaches and palm trees that surround the shoreline make it the perfect place to relax on a relaxed day in the sun.
sources.shortName: 8 surprising facts you didn’t know about Sharjah beaches – UAE Travel and Expat Life!!

sources.snippet: Al Fisht Beach offers a serene and tranquil escape for those seeking leisure and relaxation. If you’re not in search of adventure or thrill, this beach in Sharjah is the perfect destination. The soft white sands and palm trees lining the coast create a picturesque setting ideal for unwinding on a lazy day.
sources.shortName: Discover Beaches in Sharjah: Your Guide to Coastal Paradise

sources.snippet: It is the finest beach in Sharjah for a household to eat al fresco. The beach is covered for a while and surrounded by palm trees creating a conducive atmosphere. As the sun emerges, the sand glitters, causing mirage to improve the time-out experience.
sources.siteName: Latest News Dubai | Dubai Travel | Explore Dubai
sources.shortName: 6 Finest Beaches in Sharjah

sources.snippet: Do you want to have a peaceful evening walk or a picnic with your loved ones?. If yes then Al Fisht Beach is the perfect place for you. The white sand and palm trees lined along the coast make it the most beautiful place.
sources.shortName: Enjoy Complete Solitude with your Loved Ones

places.name: Al Heera Beach

reviews.text: My visit to Al Heera Beach was truly peaceful - the clean shore lined with countless sea shells felt calming and grounding. The beach is well-maintained, with restaurants offering a lovely ambiance, plus convenient washrooms and a prayer room. I also appreciated the choice of both paid and free parking. It's a perfect spot to relax, reflect, and enjoy nature's quiet beauty.

Al Fisht Beach in Sharjah is a solid family-friendly spot! 🌊 A lovely place to unwind with clean restrooms and a nice picnic area. It's perfect for a relaxed day out with the kids. The only downside is the lack of seating, so be sure to bring your own chairs or mats.
Still, it's a gem worth visiting!

This beach is perfect for families, with shallow, calm waters that are ideal for kids to play and swim safely. It's easy to wade out quite a distance without worrying about strong currents. The gentle waves make it great for even young children to enjoy without feeling anxious.

places.address: 219 S101, Fisht - Alheera Suburb - Sharjah, United Arab Emirates
